linkComments.text: Grouping of topics, to facilitate the search and selection of topics of interest
User selection of those topics that interest him the most. It facilitates with the consultation of the same
Topics, queries, questions that you want to share with other users
It is very important today that in an organization / company the staff can share their doubts or their knowledge with the rest of their colleagues.
